Far North’s proposed 16.5% rates rise cut to 5.1% after council finds $8.5m savings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-propose-165-rates-rise-cut-to-51-after-council-finds-85m- savings/IH227TUFCFBVVBAGRHM6RIWLTY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-propose-165-rates-rise-cut-to-51-after-council-finds-85m- savings/IH227TUFCFBVVBAGRHM6RIWLTY/ Mike Dinsdale“Residents told us ... the increase for our first year was far too high,” says mayor.
